snippet: Former Gov. Sonny Perdue testified during the trial of 12 Atlanta educators whom prosecutors have accused of participating in cheating.
abstract: Former Georgia Gov Sonny Perdue testifies during trial of 12 Atlanta public school educators who prosecutors accuse of participating in cheating plot; says wrongdoing was pervasive and that academic officials tried to impede public accounting of it.
lead_paragraph: Former Gov. Sonny Perdue testified during the trial of 12 Atlanta educators whom prosecutors have accused of participating in cheating.

headline.main: Atlanta School Cheating Was ‘Conspiratorial,’ Ex-Governor Testifies
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts: New Limits Are Placed on Cod Fishing in the Atlantic
